titles: Tvvo sermons: preached at tvvo severall visitations, at Boston, in the diocesse and country of Lincolne. By Robert Sanderson, Bachelour of Diuinitie, and late fellow of Lincolne Colledge in Oxford
author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.
publisher: Printed by G. P[urslowe] for Iohn Budge: and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard at the Signe of the Greene Dragon,
notes: On Rom. xiv.3 and Rom. iii.3.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
